channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘It’s getting scary close to retirement’: We’re 70. We have no debt, no stocks and $275K in savings. Are we in trouble?
item.description: “We will have $4,300 a month in Social Security.”

item.title: ‘She may have a spending problem’: Would it be wrong to secretly give our son money — without telling his wife?
item.description: “Our son and his wife, who are in their 30s with a child in preschool, are having marital problems.”

item.title: I’m 42, a single parent with $372K in cash and CDs. I won’t invest in stocks. Am I wrong?
item.description: “I am not comfortable putting too much cash in stocks, especially given I have two young kids.”

item.title: ‘My family is having a crisis’: My mom added my brother to her mortgage. He stopped paying. How does she get him off it?
item.description: “He refuses to take their names off the mortgage without getting paid.”

item.title: I’m 77. Despite my $1.4 million wealth, my expenses exceed my income. Do I sell stocks to pay off my mortgage?
item.description: “I started my own tax-preparation and representation firm. My annual revenue is $60,000 before taxes.”

item.title: AMD and this trucking stock are among the most overbought names on Wall Street
item.description: Using the CNBC Pro stock screener tool, we found the S&P 500's most overbought stocks according to their 14-day relative strength index, or RSI.

item.title: How Starboard could build value at Keurig Dr Pepper ahead of its JDE Peet deal
item.description: Starboard has taken a position in Keurig Dr Pepper and has held meetings with the company's management.

item.title: History shows there's a high chance that gold eases next week, says Carter Worth
item.description: Spot gold has advanced for a ninth consecutive week — an exceedingly rare circumstance, says Carter Worth.

item.title: These companies are reporting earnings next week and have momentum on their side
item.description: The third-quarter earnings season is off to a strong start, with results from major banks earlier this week helping lift the market.
